roleset.name: to blend or come together
roleset.note: COALESCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'coalesce' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 22.1. frame by Perryn (from coalesce.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: If the block being freed is adjacent to a free block on either side, it-1 is coalesced *trace*-1with it into a single bigger block, so storage does not become too fragmented.
example.arg: If the block being freed is adjacent to a free block on either side,
storage does not become too fragmented.
